description:
-Life has become such a bore. -
Lucifer and company have reached the Underworld. 
The place Beelzebub brings them to is a graveyard: a swirling whirlpool of despair, regret, and malice. 
Lucifer and Xaphan enter the fray in search of the device to control Surgat, but...
Source: Official YouTube

titles.title: 突入! アビスインフェルノ
